scripts.postbuild: node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'fs'; fs.cpSync('src/renderer/index.html', 'dist/renderer/index.html'); fs.cpSync('src/renderer/styles.css', 'dist/renderer/styles.css'); const app = fs.readFileSync('dist/renderer/app.js', 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/renderer/app.js', app.replace(/export\s*\{\s*\};?\s*$/, '')); if(fs.existsSync('dist/preload.js')){fs.rmSync('dist/preload.cjs',{force:true});fs.renameSync('dist/preload.js','dist/preload.cjs');} const preload = fs.readFileSync('dist/preload.cjs', 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/preload.cjs', preload.replace(/export\s*\{\s*\};?\s*$/, ''));"
